main event: Radar target observed intermittently, described as a red or orange light with one or more white lights, moving slowly against the wind on December 13, 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed visually through binoculars,The object moved against the wind and emitted no sound,Numerous reported sightings of unknown objects occurred in the same area around the time of the sighting,The observation duration was noted but remains unknown,The report was part of Project Blue Book and includes multiple UFO reports from pilots involved in training exercises.
sighted object: red or orange light with one or more white lights
witness description: Visual observations made through binoculars by unidentified observers.
